title: The AI Bubble Burst Clock
subtitle: A timeline of predictions that never come true.
submit_prediction: Know of a Prediction? Submit it Here
form_description: Found a new AI doomsday prediction or hype bubble claim? Let us know!
status_explanation: Future: Prediction starts later. Active: Currently tracking. Expired: Failed.
about_welcome: Witness the grand timeline of artificial intelligence hubris.
about_desc1: We serve as the silent observers of an industry prone to spectacular proclamations. This archive meticulously records the bold prophecies of the technological eliteâ€”claims that promised utopia but delivered only delays.
about_desc2: The Great Clock stands as a testament to reality's persistence. Explore our Player Cards to analyze the stats of the industry's loudest voices, unlock Achievements as you uncover the system's secrets, and consult the Hype Dictionary to decode the jargon of the Intelligence Age.
secret_hint: Psst... rumor has it the main title hides a retro secret if you tap it enough times.
report_bug_desc: Found something broken? Let us know.
clock_label: TIME SINCE AI WAS DECLARED DEAD
status_future_tooltip: Prediction validity starts in the future. Countdown hasn't begun.
status_active_tooltip: Prediction is currently being tracked. The 2-week validation window is open.
status_expired_tooltip: The 2-week window has passed. The prediction failed to materialize.
privacy_policy_content: This site uses Google AdSense to serve ads. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to this website or other websites. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Ads Settings.
site_disclaimer: For satirical and informational purposes only.
hype_def_agentic: System design enabling LLMs to autonomously utilize tools and iterative feedback loops to solve complex, multi-step problems.
hype_def_hallucination: Generative artifacts where a model produces non-factual outputs. A primary focus of current alignment and grounding research.
hype_def_slop: The abundance of AI-generated content. While challenging for curation, it offers opportunities for training on reasoned traces and high-volume data.
hype_def_collapse: A theoretical risk where models degrade if trained solely on synthetic data, solvable through rigorous data curation and ratio balancing.
hype_def_prompt: The precise optimization of context windows and instructions to elicit maximal reasoning capabilities from large language models.
hype_def_agi: Artificial General Intelligence. The theoretical milestone where synthetic cognition matches or exceeds human adaptability across all domains.
hype_def_alignment: The critical scientific discipline ensuring advanced AI systems remain interpretable, controllable, and beneficial to humanity.
hype_def_asi: Artificial Superintelligence. The point where synthetic cognition surpasses human capability across all domains.
hype_def_singularity: The theoretical event horizon where technological growth becomes uncontrollable and irreversible, fundamentally altering civilization.
hype_def_ubi: Universal Basic Income. A necessary economic floor in a post-labor abundance economy.
hype_def_chain_of_thought: The cognitive architecture allowing models to decompose complex problems into sequential reasoning steps.
hype_def_world_model: An internal representation of physical laws and causal relationships, allowing AI to simulate outcomes before acting.
hype_def_reasoning_model: Systems optimized for logical deduction and problem-solving over mere pattern matching.
hype_def_multimodality: The unification of text, vision, and audio into a single fluid stream of machine understanding.
hype_def_tree_of_thought: A hierarchical reasoning framework allowing models to explore multiple deduction paths simultaneously, pruning dead ends like a grandmaster.
hype_def_graph_of_thought: Non-linear cognitive architecture where reasoning steps form a complex network, mimicking the interconnected nature of human insight.
hype_def_transformer: The neural architecture that ignited the current revolution. An attention-based mechanism capable of weighing the significance of every token in parallel.
hype_def_token: The atomic unit of machine understanding. A fragment of text or data that, when woven together in billions, forms the illusion of thought.
reset_modal_msg: WARNING: This action cannot be undone. All your unlocked achievements will be lost forever.
